an5.35:4.1: “Mendicants, there are five benefits of giving.
an5.35:4.3: A giver, a donor is loved and liked by many people.
an5.35:4.6: They don’t neglect a layperson’s duties.
an5.35:4.7: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
an5.35:4.8: These are the five benefits of giving.”
an5.35:5.2: and follows the way of the good.
